title: Is Artificial Intelligence the Next Co-Engineer?
description: Tech Transformation: Explore how AI is reshaping engineering roles, from automation to strategy, and why human judgment remains vital in the AI era.
content:
Today’s engineers are empowered to move beyond execution into strategic thinking—shaping systems that learn, adapt, and evolve. This transformation instills a deeper sense of purpose and responsibility.

title: Apple iOS 26 to roll out today: Check new features, updates and eligible devices
description: Apple will release iOS 26 on Monday for many devices. This update introduces a new 'Liquid Glass' design. It also expands Artificial Intelligence features across iPhones. Live Translation, Visual Intelligence, and Image Playground are new additions. Communication tools will reduce interruptions. Maps and Apple Music get smarter. The update includes accessibility and family management improvements.

title: Malaysia and Zetrix AI Partner to Build Global Standards for Shariah
description: Johor Bahru [Malaysia], September 15: In a significant step towards islamic values-based artificial intelligence, Zetrix AI Berhad, developer of the world's first Shariah-aligned Large Language Model (LLM) NurAi and the Government of Malaysia, through the Prime Minister's Department (Religious Affairs), today signed a Letter of Intent (LOI) to collaborate on establishing the foremost global framework for Shariah compliance, certification and governance in AI. The ceremony was witnessed by Prime Minister YAB Dato' Seri Anwar Ibrahim.

title: Semiconductor, AI infra to get big chunk of new tech fund
description: The IDTA was launched on September 2, at Semicon India 2025, to mobilise private capital and expertise for deep tech companies in India and foster US-India collaboration in sectors such as semiconductors, artificial intelligence (AI) and space. Founded by venture capital and private equity firms from both countries, it aims to spur investment with an initial capital commitment of $1 billion.
